overview: Geometrics of the Kabbalah (1975)  Short film  Dir. Storm De Hirsch  "5 is water, 5 is the letter X. 5 is distance. 5 says no. 5 laughs when divided into 2. 5 swims backwards, and space is five. The cherry tree is one. The hurt is 1 plus 1, the wish is two. The wonder three. The absence four, and the five is the Universe. The Universe in the head, the universe in the eye, the sky and the waterdrop."â€“from Brook 16, "Source Books of Storm De Hirsch," 9/24/66.
title: Geometrics of the Kabbalah
